Articles.Content:
Version: KSP OSX 1.3 (Uncertain if 32bit or 64 bit)

Mod List:

 

Like some other reports, KSP is about at the end of the loading, when it crashes. A few mods seem to cause this, and a few examples seem to include BDArmory (but not Baha Turret), SM Armory (with SM Industries), and Modular Kolonization System (MKS). The above are the mods that DO seem to work, though adding any of the ones I just listed makes the game crash. I assume it isn't related to memory, because if I remove a big folder like the BoulderCo from Andromeda: Daydream and add BDA, it still crashes.

Link to the Player.log
Looking at the log, that's an error I've never seen before. I'd recommend reinstalling KSP because it seemed to be having problems loading native KSP dlls.
I second that idea. Try removing all of your mods reinstalling KSP and then redownloading any mods you had.
